languages.text: "Кх-кхм. Слушайте все! Перед вами {mf|Его|Ее} Светлость {name} фон Валанциус, Вольный Торговец и венценосн{mf|ый|ая} властитель{mf||ница} сего мира! Склоните же головы, никчемнейшие, и уступите сво{mf|ему|ей} госпо{mf|дину|же} назанченное вам место в очереди!"

traits.locale_text: "Кх-кхм. Слушайте все! Перед вами {mf|Его|Ее} Светлость {name} фон Валанциус, Вольный Торговец и венценосн{mf|ый|ая} властитель{mf||ница} сего мира! Склоните же головы, никчемнейшие, и уступите сво{mf|ему|ей} госпо{mf|дину|же} назанченное вам место в очереди!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Hem-ahem. Attention, all! Before you is {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} {name} von Valancius, Rogue Trader and anointed sovereign of this world! Bow your unworthy heads and give your {mf|master|mistress} {mf|his|her} rightful place in the queue!"
languages.original_text: "Кх-кхм. Слушайте все! Перед вами {mf|Его|Ее} Светлость {name} фон Валанциус, Вольный Торговец и венценосн{mf|ый|ая} властитель{mf||ница} сего мира! Склоните же головы, никчемнейшие, и уступите сво{mf|ему|ей} госпо{mf|дину|же} назанченное вам место в очереди!"

traits.locale_text: "Hem-ahem. Attention, all! Before you is {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} {name} von Valancius, Rogue Trader and anointed sovereign of this world! Bow your unworthy heads and give your {mf|master|mistress} {mf|his|her} rightful place in the queue!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Hem-ahem. Attention, all! Before you is {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} {name} von Valancius, Rogue Trader and anointed sovereign of this world! Bow your unworthy heads and give your {mf|master|mistress} {mf|his|her} rightful place in the queue!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Hem-ahem. Attention, all! Before you is {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} {name} von Valancius, Rogue Trader and anointed sovereign of this world! Bow your unworthy heads and give your {mf|master|mistress} {mf|his|her} rightful place in the queue!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Hem-ahem. Attention, all! Before you is {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} {name} von Valancius, Rogue Trader and anointed sovereign of this world! Bow your unworthy heads and give your {mf|master|mistress} {mf|his|her} rightful place in the queue!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “咳咳，所有人，注意了！站在你们面前的，是{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯大人。{mf|他|她}是受到祝福的行商浪人，也是这个世界的主宰者！低下你们下贱的头颅，为你们的{mf|主人|女主人}让出道路，让{mf|他|她}得到{mf|他|她}应有的位置吧！”
languages.original_text: "Hem-ahem. Attention, all! Before you is {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} {name} von Valancius, Rogue Trader and anointed sovereign of this world! Bow your unworthy heads and give your {mf|master|mistress} {mf|his|her} rightful place in the queue!"

traits.locale_text: “咳咳，所有人，注意了！站在你们面前的，是{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯大人。{mf|他|她}是受到祝福的行商浪人，也是这个世界的主宰者！低下你们下贱的头颅，为你们的{mf|主人|女主人}让出道路，让{mf|他|她}得到{mf|他|她}应有的位置吧！”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Ejem, ejem. ¡Atención todo el mundo! ¡Ante vosotros se encuentra su señoría {name} von Valancius, Comerciante Independiente y recién nombrad{mf|o|a} soberan{mf|o|a} de este mundo! ¡Inclinad vuestras indignas cabezas y dadle a vuestr{mf|o|a} señor{mf||a} el lugar que le corresponde en la cola!».
languages.original_text: "Hem-ahem. Attention, all! Before you is {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} {name} von Valancius, Rogue Trader and anointed sovereign of this world! Bow your unworthy heads and give your {mf|master|mistress} {mf|his|her} rightful place in the queue!"

traits.locale_text: «Ejem, ejem. ¡Atención todo el mundo! ¡Ante vosotros se encuentra su señoría {name} von Valancius, Comerciante Independiente y recién nombrad{mf|o|a} soberan{mf|o|a} de este mundo! ¡Inclinad vuestras indignas cabezas y dadle a vuestr{mf|o|a} señor{mf||a} el lugar que le corresponde en la cola!».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「えー、おほん。注目せよ、皆の者！ここにいるのは我らが陛下、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス、自由開拓者にしてこの星の支配者である！無価値な頭を下げ、我らが{mf|マスター|ミストレス}にふさわしい列の場所を譲りたまえ！」
languages.original_text: "Hem-ahem. Attention, all! Before you is {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} {name} von Valancius, Rogue Trader and anointed sovereign of this world! Bow your unworthy heads and give your {mf|master|mistress} {mf|his|her} rightful place in the queue!"

traits.locale_text: 「えー、おほん。注目せよ、皆の者！ここにいるのは我らが陛下、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス、自由開拓者にしてこの星の支配者である！無価値な頭を下げ、我らが{mf|マスター|ミストレス}にふさわしい列の場所を譲りたまえ！」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Hum, hum. Votre attention, s'il vous plaît ! Devant vous se tient Sa Seigneurie {name} von Valancius, {mf|libre-marchand et souverain consacré|libre-marchande et souveraine consacrée} de ce monde ! Inclinez-vous devant votre auguste {mf|maître|maîtresse} et cédez-lui la place qui lui revient dans la file d'attente ! »
languages.original_text: "Hem-ahem. Attention, all! Before you is {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} {name} von Valancius, Rogue Trader and anointed sovereign of this world! Bow your unworthy heads and give your {mf|master|mistress} {mf|his|her} rightful place in the queue!"

traits.locale_text: « Hum, hum. Votre attention, s'il vous plaît ! Devant vous se tient Sa Seigneurie {name} von Valancius, {mf|libre-marchand et souverain consacré|libre-marchande et souveraine consacrée} de ce monde ! Inclinez-vous devant votre auguste {mf|maître|maîtresse} et cédez-lui la place qui lui revient dans la file d'attente ! »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ähem! Alle mal hergehört! Vor Euch steht {mf|Seine Lordschaft|Ihre Ladyschaft} {name} von Valancius, {mf|Freihändler und gesalbter Souverän|Freihändlerin und gesalbte Souveränin} dieser Welt! Beugt Eure unwürdigen Köpfe und gebt {mf|Eurem Herren seinen|Eurer Herrin ihren} angemessenen Platz in der Warteschlange!"
languages.original_text: "Hem-ahem. Attention, all! Before you is {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} {name} von Valancius, Rogue Trader and anointed sovereign of this world! Bow your unworthy heads and give your {mf|master|mistress} {mf|his|her} rightful place in the queue!"

traits.locale_text: "Ähem! Alle mal hergehört! Vor Euch steht {mf|Seine Lordschaft|Ihre Ladyschaft} {name} von Valancius, {mf|Freihändler und gesalbter Souverän|Freihändlerin und gesalbte Souveränin} dieser Welt! Beugt Eure unwürdigen Köpfe und gebt {mf|Eurem Herren seinen|Eurer Herrin ihren} angemessenen Platz in der Warteschlange!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Öhö öhö. Herkes beni dinlesin! Bu dünyanın kutsanmış hükümdarı, Hür Tacir {mf|Lord|Leydi} {name} von Valancius Hazretleri karşınızda! Kıymetsiz başlarınızı eğin ve {mf|sahibinize|sahibenize} kuyrukta hakkı olan sırayı verin!"
languages.original_text: "Hem-ahem. Attention, all! Before you is {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} {name} von Valancius, Rogue Trader and anointed sovereign of this world! Bow your unworthy heads and give your {mf|master|mistress} {mf|his|her} rightful place in the queue!"

traits.locale_text: "Öhöm. Herkes beni dinlesin! Bu dünyanın kutsanmış hükümdarı, Hür Tacir {mf|Lord|Leydi} {name} von Valancius Hazretleri karşınızda! Kıymetsiz başlarınızı eğin ve {mf|sahibinize|sahibenize} kuyrukta hakkı olan sırayı verin!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
